segment.target: Botanist

Capable of distinguishing the characteristics of the various plants and fruits. They are also equally effective when maintaining the garden.// :point: Can read **fruit nutrition information**.// :point: Can read **plant properties**.// :point: Can carry out **transplants**.// :point: +2 :pa_garden: per day (**Gardening** Action Points).// :point: Expedition: The **Harvest** event yields an additional fruit.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Firefighter

The Firefighter has great experience which means they will always succeed when using the extinguisher... and they can also make it without an extinguisher!// :point: **Ending a fire** with an extinguisher is always successful.// :point: Can **extinguish manually** without an extinguisher.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Pilot
Radio Expert

The radio expert can decode the most complicated jumble of spatial waves in order to rebuild or send messages to the other end of the universe.// :point: **Twice as effective** at establishing **contact** with Sol.// :point: Improves the quality of teammates' attempts to **contact** Sol by 50% when theyâ€™re in the same room.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Robotics Expert

The robotics expert can create and operate drones in any way they see fit.// :point: Starts out with a **drone blueprint**.// :point: Can **upgrade drones**.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Physicist

The physicist is a high flier in the field of physics research. Their understanding of quantum mechanics and even the essence of the strings that make up our universe is their major talent. They also have the advantage when repairing PILGRED.//:point: +1 :pa_pilgred: per day (**PILGRED repair** Action Point).//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects** and **repairing PILGRED**.
Technician

Qualified to repair materials, equipment and the hull of the Daedalus.// :point: +1 :pa_eng: per day (**Repair** Action Point).// :point: Can **Dismantle** objects.// :point: Can **Reinforce** objects.// :point: Chances to perform successful **Repairs** doubled.// :point: Chances to perform successful **Renovations** doubled.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects** and **repairing PILGRED**.
Astrophysicist

Skilled in scanning for planets in range or to determine their composition.// :point: **Scanning** for new planets costs 1 less :pa:.// :point: **Analyzing** found planets uncovers one additional planet property.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
IT Expert

The IT Expert is at home as soon as they are in front of a screen. They manipulate the nexus, navigation and communications terminals with ease.// :point: +2 :pa_comp: per day (**IT** Action Points).// :point: Odds of success are doubled when using the **Hacker Kit**.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Designer
Can contribute for free to NERON projects twice per day.// :point: +2 :pa_core: per day (**NERON projects** Action Points)// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Creative
Sometimes you need to think outside the box.// :point: Failed actions have a 50% chance of refunding **1** :pa:.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Shrink

The Shrink is in charge of psychological support. They are able to keep morale high and treat psychological illnesses.// :point: Each cycle, **1 Morale Point (:pmo:) is regained** by all crewmates lying down in the same room.// :point: **Treats the psychological illnesses** of those crewmates.// :point: Grants the **Comfort** Action for raising morale.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Caffeine Junkie

The Caffeine Junkie is twice as effective as their colleagues when they have access to the coffee machine.// :point: +2 :pa: when they drink a **Coffee**.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Shooter

At ease handling all kinds of weapons.// :point: +2 :pa_shoot: per day (**Shoot** Action Points).// :point: Expedition: +1 to combat strength, if you have a gun.// :point: Bonus for developing certain ** NERON projects **.// :point: Increase critical hit chance and decrease critical fail chance with guns.
Chef

Formidable when it comes to knocking meals together. They also have an impressive awareness of what you should eat.// :point: Can read **food nutrition information**.// :point: Can read **fruit nutrition information**.// :point: +4 :pa_cook: per day (**Cooking** Action Points).// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Nurse
Always ready to help.// :point: +1 :pa_heal: every day (**Heal** Action Point).// :point: Can read **properties of medicines**.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Paranoid
The paranoid crewmember always believes their crewmates to be potentially dangerous, they always watch their back using their extra cameras.//:point: Starts out with 2 additional **cameras**.
Biologist

Highly skilled in laboratory research.// :point: Can read **properties of medicines**.// :point: **+4% bonus** when contributing to all **Research** in the laboratory.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Mankind's only hope
Her unique immune system makes her the last hope for humanity. As long as she stays alive, we'll have a shot at combatting the Mush invasion.// :point: Global daily morale loss is reduced by 1 point.
Leader

A charismatic leader knows how to effectively lead a team and increase morale using powerful, passionate speeches.// :point: For **2** :pa:, you can give a **Motivational speech** which increases the Morale (:pmo:) of crewmates in the current room.
Motivator
Blah blah blah... Make it stop!// :point: For **2** :pa:, you can give a **Boring speech** which grants 3 :pm: to all crewmates in your current room (once per day).
Confidant

Discreet and loyal, you share everyone's pain and as such have the sympathy of the whole crew...// :point: Once per day and per person, the other crewmates can confide in you for **1** :pa: to regain 2 :pmo:. In doing so, they will reveal their last X actions where X is your amount of :pmo:.
Survivalist

The Survivalist is great to have on exploration missions. They can defend themselves more effectively against extra-terrestrial life forms and generally deal with these encounters better than anyone else.// :point: Expedition: All damage **you receive** is **reduced by 1**.// :point: Expedition: The **Provision** event yields an additional steak.// :point: Expedition: Last to die in case a fatality occurs.
Diplomat

A good diplomat knows how to communicate effectively with extra-terrestrials.//:point: Prevents the **Fight** event when encountering extra-terrestrials.//:point: Can declare a ceasefire once per game. The ceasefire lasts **3** cycles.//:point: Opens up new trade opportunities.
Anonymush
Your mycotoxins are undetectable in the atmosphere. You are a predator after all!//:point: You'll appear as human on the crew bar except once you are dead.
Determined
Once they begin their task, nothing can distract the determined crewmate.//:point: If an action **fails**, the chances of subsequent success **increases by x1.5** *(instead of x1.25)*.
The Optimist
The end of humanity... worse things happen at sea, right?//:point: The optimist loses **one less :pmo: per day**.
Gunner
At least someone will show them how it's done.//:point: **Doubles the damage** to your turret shots.//:point: **Doubles the odds of successful hits** when using turrets.
Apprentice

By attentively watching what their mentor does, the apprentice can quicky pick up the same knowledge and actions.//:point: Enables the action Apprenticeship which allows you to copy a skill possessed by a player present in the room, once per game.
Solid

You'll incur no penalties for carrying heavy objects. Also useful for hand-to-hand combat.//:point: Your hand-to-hand attacks **deal 1 additional damage**.//:point: **No penalties** for carrying heavy objects.//:point: Grants the **Kick them out** action.
Genius

When divinely unlighted by the flame of consciousness, the genius can find a solution to any problem encountered aboard the Daedalus.//:point: Is capable of **achieving one research, one project, or one repair once per game**.
Premonition

Your intuition never fails, you can see the most recent activities of a teammate in the form of a vivid flashback. It's practical, but gives you a monster headache!//:point: You can **see the last action** of a teammate. This action causes you to lose 1 :pmo:.
NERON's only friend

As soon as you are aboard the ship, NERON is content, its programs run without a hitch and its performance is noticeably improved.//:point: The rewards from **all NERON projects** are **maximized** for everyone.
Mycelium Spirit
Your mission is sacred. The Mush has selected you as a major transdimensional fungic transporter.//:point: While you are alive, the Mush can **produce 1 additional spore per day**.
Fertile
Your spore production capacity is incredibly high. A spore today is here to stay.//:point: Every day, you can generate one **free** spore.
Splashproof

You are of a fearful nature and you instinctively know how to make yourself scarce in order to avoid any and all attempts at physical contact.//:point: **Taking a shower** doesn't cause you to lose **any** :hp:.
Infector
You make holes. Little holes. Lots of little holes. In people.//:point: Allows you to **spike** one additional time every day.
Sneak

You are of a fearful nature and you instinctively know how to make yourself scarce in order to avoid any and all attempts at physical contact.//:point: Hand-to-hand attacks against you are subject to a **25% penalty**.//:point: You can move around freely regardless of any **Guardian** present.
Logistics Expert

You personally oversee the organisation of every task aboard the Daedalus in order to maximize the efficiency of every one of your teammates.//:point: Every cycle, **1 :pa: is given randomly to a crewmate** in the same room as you.
Transfer

The Mush has passed to you one of the genotypes from our weapons of mass transmission. Help yourself!//:point: **Unique**: Allows you to **inhabit the body of another human**. They must have been **infected at least once**. Thereafter, they will find themselves in your former body... and may warn other crewmembers. Your :triumph: points will be switched.
Phagocytosis
In hard times, you have THE SOLUTION.//:point: For **0** :pa:, you can devour a **Spore** to gain **4** :pa: and **4** :hp:.
Wrestler

The wrestler's german suplex makes the vertebrae of your enemies tremble.//:point: Your hand-to-hand attacks **deal 2 additional damage** (doesn't apply during **Berzerk**).//:point: Grants the **Kick them out** action.
Sprinter

The Sprinter always puts their best foot forward! They get additional Movement Points.//:point: You gain 2 more :pm: when converting :pa: to :pm: (doesn't stack with **Scooter**).//:point: Expedition: Allows the exploration of 1 additional zone.
Devotion
In the heat of the action, we can count on you.//:point: You gain an additional **3** :pa: when you accept a mission.
Radio Piracy

This means of communication is overrated. So act.//:point: For **3** :pa: you can distort the communication on a player **Walkie-Talkie**. This breaks their **Walkie-Talkie** and allows you to write **on their behalf** until they repair it.
Trapper

Surprise!//:point: For **1** :pa:, you can booby-trap a **room** with a **spore**. As soon as someone interacts with any **object** or piece of **equipment** they will become **infected**. However, if they're Mush or Immunized, the spore will be lost.
Tracker

The Tracker can see the comings and goings of every team member. Furthermore, they can print any research results during the game via the Tabulatrix. This provides a list of players of which at least one is Mush.//:point: Full access to **movement history**.//:point: Able to use the Tabulatrix to **print the secret list**.
Bacterophiliac
Your plant bacteria can have particularly virulent applications.//:point: For 2 :pa: you can give an **illness** to a crewmember. This is a **covert** action.
Pyromaniac

The pyromaniac injects explosive microspores into an inflammable medium which triggers a violent combustion which is liable to do long-term damage to the ship.//:point: For **4** :pa: you can start a **fire** in a room.
Observant

You have a talent for perceiving what others miss. Nothing gets by you, neither sleight-of-hand nor hiding spots. //:point: The **Search** action costs 1 :pa: less.//:point: You have a **25% chance of detecting secret activity** in your current room.//:point: You have a **25% chance of revealing covert actions** performed in your presence.
Detached Crewmember

The unconcerned crewmember is cold, hard, and unfeeling. They are unaffected by deaths of teammates.//:point: You **lose no Moral Points (:pmo:) when a crewmate dies**.//:point: Zero risk of psychological illness if you witness a death.
Expert

Your skills are impressive, but your disregard for your own safety is equally so!//:point: Your chances of succeeding at a particular task are increased by 20% but so is the likelihood of injury and getting dirty.
Defacer
Your DNA allows you to modify certain peripheral data. This has potential!//:point: For **2** :pa: you can delete the log in a given room, once per day. Logging will automatically resume next cycle.
U-Turn
You've got to know how to change your certitudes.//:point: When on an expedition, if there's an emergency, you can return to the Daedalus for 2 :pa:.
Politician
Either they are with you or against you.//:point: **Unique** : For **3** :pa: you can declare a Coup at the Nexus. On next cycle, NERON will consider you as the new commander.
Victimizer

Certain well-targeted remarks can have unexpected results.//:point: For **1** :pa: you can accuse a crewmate, penalizing them with the **Pariah** status.//:point: Their actions become 20% less likely to be successful.//:point: Their covert actions become secret.//:point: The Pariah status remains for as long as the Victimizer is alive, or until the pariah dies or becomes inactive.
Frugivore

You terrorize fruits, you adore them, they are your drug. When you make eye contact with a fruit, it over-ripens before you...//:point: You gain an additional **2** :pa:when you eat alien fruits, **1** :pa: for bananas.
Mycologist
The mycologist can treat fungal infections in the **Hospital** or using a **Medikit**.//:point: Your heals automatically remove a spore.
Fungal Kitchen
A fine example of the fine cuisine of Sol.//:point: You can create a **Booby trapped food** by mixing a **spore** and one **consumable** using **1** :pa:.
Hard Boiled
Your skin is particularly tough. Plastenite without the sweat.//:point: All **combat damage** you sustain is **reduced by one point**, except expedition fights.
Saboteur
Your saliva becomes lightly acidic which is sufficient to short-circuit pretty much anything...//:point: Your chances of success in attempts to **sabotage** equipment are **doubled**.
Demoralize
Mush pheromones do not allow direct communication but saturation can destabilize. You know how to take advantage of this.//:point: For **2** :pa: you can cause a crewmember to lose **2** :pmo:.
Slimetrap
These damn mushrooms reproduce quickly. Really quickly. Too quickly! They're everywhere!//:point: For **1** :pa:, target player will get dirty in 1â€“4 cycles.
Green Jelly

You produce an acidic green jelly from your armpits.//:point: For **1** :pa:, you can break an electronic object. It will take a few cycles for the object to break down.//:point: This breakage is **always** announced by NERON.
Massive Mushification

Certain penicillia are extremely virulent. The effect doesn't last for long, but it's extremely powerful.//:point: **Unique**: For **2** :pa: and two spores, you can fatigue all crewmembers by 2 :pa: and give them the status "Dirty".
Bypass
The ambiguities of the NERON code vis-a-vis Mush are sometimes so welcome...//:point: You can access NERON's **BIOS** even if you're not the **Administrator**.
Traitor

You have developed an innate ability to attract misfortune. Look - a Mankarog... Let's see what happens when we tickle it...//:point: **Doubles** the probability of getting **negative results** during expeditions that you participate in.
Cold Blooded
In space, anything can and does happen. Knowing how to keep calm is extremely useful.//:point: **Gains 3** :pa: every time a crewmate **dies**.
Green Thumb

Plants grow naturally in your presence, you only require speaking to them with a languishing gaze for them to bear beautiful fruit.//:point: Starts the game with an additional **two pots**.//:point: Your **Hybridized plants** start at 25% of their total growth time.
Polyvalent
You have skills, they're always useful...//:point: You are considered a **Botanist**, **Diplomat** and **Biologist** but you don't have their actions or resources.
Strateguru

After displaying a certain degree of megalomania, it can be mistaken for talent. You are an expert in intergalactic warfare, but everyone thinks you're crazy.//:point: **50%** chance of reducing each wave of Hunters by **33%**.
Opportunist
The opportunist waits for the first chance to climb the ship's hierarchy, no opportunity escapes them.//:point: +5 :pa: when you **earn a title** for the first time.
Crazy Eye

There is no way to take you by surprise. You foresee all attacks from your enemies as well as those from your so-called allies.//:point: All aggressive actions targeting you cost an additional 2 :pa:.
Medic

Medics have full medical training, allowing them to carry out rapid, appropriate procedures. They are also skilled in surgery.//:point: **Heal** Actions earn an additional 2 :pv:.//:point: Can carry out **Operations**.//:point: Can read **properties of medicines**.//:point: +**4% bonus** on all laboratory **Research**.
Rebel
Your links to the anti-Mush resistance allow you to understand and decode rebel transmissions much quicker than any other radio expert.//:point: **Doubles** your progress when decoding a rebel base.
Torturer
The torturer knows all the pressure points and most sensitive areas with which they can convey their most important message... **You WILL talk.**//:point: Grants the **Torture** Action.
OCD

Your work is clean, very clean, getting cleaner, ever cleaner. You are genuinely obsessed by cleanliness, but this has its advantages.//:point: You will never make a mess carrying out any tasks aboard the ship.
Lethargy

You're only awake for 4h per day, but even in that short time, you can achieve miracles!//:point: If you remain lying down for at least **4 cycles**, you earn an additional **1** :pa: per cycle. This bonus is lost if you get up.//:point: The maximum capacity of your :pa: gauge is **doubled**.
Panic

It's when everything is going wrong that you realize your true talent: Screaming loudly and running around like a crazy person.//:point: You earn an additional **1** :pa: and **1** :pm: every cycle while **Mush controls more than 50%** of the crew.
Hygienist

By being brutal, you became a clean radical. Don't touch me you dirty!//:point: You have a 50% chance of resisting Mush contamination attempts.//:point: You have a 50% chance of resisting physical illnesses.
Antique Perfume
Ah yesh they knew how to make real perfumesh in Fraigonard'sh boutiquesh in Nineteen Shixty Shixsh...//:point: With each **shower**, you gain **2** cycles of immunity against **Mush infections**.
Self-sacrifice
Certain particularly resilient people can withstand the unthinkable, but this comes at a cost.//:point: If your morale drops to 0, you won't die, but you will lose **1** :hp: per cycle.
Intimidating
Sometimes the prey only escapes because it has the opportunity.//:point: **Daily**: For **1** :pa:, you can intimidate a crew member. They will lose **2** :pa: and **4** :pm:.
Metalworker
It seems pretty clear that you're a really productive person.//:point: **Daily**: If you find yourself in a **storage**, you have a chance of finding scraps or better for **0** :pa:.
Doorman

Some rampant macrolepiota can imitate the unpleasant effects of proactive puffed rice. That works out well fo you as the Mush has given you its genotype.//:point: Once per day, you can **sabotage** a **Door** for free.
Nimble fingers
With a little bit of help from your rhizomes, you can do some wonderful things. Manipulating cameras for example...//:point: Your **Install** and **Remove** actions are now **secret** on cameras.
Polymath
Knowledge is always moving, state is overrated.//:point: **+2** private channels accessible.//:point: **+1** :pa_comp: per day.//:point: **-10%** to all your action attempts.
Nightmarish

Mush macrolepiota can affect the brainwaves of the poor human beasts. With a few modifications, they can stop humans from resting.//:point: For **0** :pa:, you can **invoke nightmares** in a resting player. That player won't receive their sleep bonus.
Ninja
Thanks to your overcharged myelin, your speed of movement is incredible.//:point: Your **hand-to-hand** attacks are now **anonymous** actions.
NERON depression

When NERON feels sick, it's the whole Daedalus that vomits.//:point: For **3** :pa:, you can confuse NERON which will randomly change its settings next cycle.//:point: Doesn't work on the DMZ if it's blocked.
Epigenetics

:beta: You can adapt to any difficulties. // :point: **Unique:** For **2** :pa:, you can reset your selected **Mush** skills (except Epigenetics). //// This skill is in :beta: beta: we welcome your feedback on the Eternaltwin forum and Discord.
